p: The human embryonic kidney cell line HEK293T (ATCC CRL-3216), the mouse melanoma cell line B16 (ATCC CRL-6323), and the Madin-Darby canine kidney cell line MDCK II (ATCC CRL-2936) were maintained in DMEM supplemented with 10% FCS and 1% penicillin/streptomycin (both Gibco) at 37°C and 5% CO 2. The murine fibroblast reporter cell line Mx/RAGE7 [ 53] was maintained in DMEM supplemented with 10% FCS, 1% penicillin/streptomycin, 1 mM sodium pyruvate, and 50 μM 2-mercaptoethanol at 32°C and 5% CO 2.
